nodes.text: The Moog-3000 Death Synthesizer, also known simply as the Trade Federation cannon, was a model of double-barreled repeating blaster used by the Trade Federation in the year 32 BBY during the Invasion of Naboo. They were mounted on tri-pods, and have a small targeting computer on top. They have a long-range and possess strong firepower. They were placed throughout the city of Theed on Naboo. On multiple occasions during the invasion, cannons were taken over by the Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi and turned against the Trade Federation B1-Series battle droid army.

The Moog-3000 Death Synthesizer was first mentioned in a preview for the 2001 video game Star Wars: Obi-Wan in the "State of the Arts" department in Star Wars Gamer 7, shipped to subscribers on October 16, 2001.
